sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'
import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'

const Product = ({product}) => {
    return (
        <>
            <Card>
                <Link to="/" className="text-center py-3" >
                    <Card.Img variant="top" src={product.image} className="card-image my-3"/>
                </Link>
                <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Title style={{height: "75px", overflow:"hidden"}} >
                       {product.name}
                    </Card.Title> 
                    <Card.Text>
                        Price: {product.price}
                    </Card.Text>
                    <Card.Text>
                        Rating: {product.rating} | {product.numReviews} user ratings
                    </Card.Text>
                    <Button className="btn card-btn m-3 py-3" > Add To Cart </Button>
                    <Button className="btn card-btn m-3 py-3"> See Details </Button>
                </Card.Body>
            </Card>
        </>
    )
}

export default Product
